data.name: Zeepkist - Early Access Testing DLC
data.detailed_description:
A special white and orange testing zeepkist + helmet, only available while Zeepkist is still in Early Access!

To celebrate the launch of online multiplayer, to award early access buyers of Zeepkist something special, and to see how the whole process of making DLC actually works, I created this free piece of DLC which consists of one limited edition soapbox and one limited edition helmet. You'll be able to rock these in online multiplayer, regular gameplay, as well as in the level editor!

Enjoy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.8 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1060 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These are the Developer's PC specs that are known to perform well. Less powerful systems may work, but mileage will vary!

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
